thread.title_full: Expectations were met! - Review of Hilton Garden Inn New York/West 35th Street, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: 878lucim
title: Expectations were met! - Review
text: The staff was friendly and accommodating but our room was a little small. We had a room that was in back of the elevators. We were worried we would hear the elevator all night but it seemed the room was soundproof. Otherwise the room met our needs since we were only staying one night. If you have a choice of rooms, make sure you are aware that they have rooms that are different sizes.
